title: Australia's Steve Smith 'deeply regrets' ball tampering
text:
Australia's Steve Smith 'deeply regrets' ball tampering Sunday, March 25, 2018 - 01:06 
Australia's cricket captain Steve Smith says he's 'not proud at what's happened' for his part in a ball-tampering incident during the third test against South Africa   
Australia's cricket captain Steve Smith says he's 'not proud at what's happened' for his part in a ball-tampering incident during the third test against South Africa  //reut.rs/2Guq17O
